definition: to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Can even be used as a sun shield for stroller.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以作为一个婴儿车遮阳板使用。

sentences.english: Position sun visors on the roof lining and tighten with the fastening screws.
sentences.chinese: 将遮阳板放在车顶衬里上并用紧固螺钉拧紧。

definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp
glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
reflector (typically concave, as in a torch)/mirror (typically plane or convex)
antipinch (e.g. preventing catching fingers in automatic car windows)
mirror showing a view to one's rear (including rearview mirror, side-view mirror, baby view mirror etc)
